item.title: The 90/10 Rule: The Inconvenient Truth About Agentic AI - It’s All Plumbing, No Brain
item.description: The real challenge in building AI agents isn’t the AI - it’s everything else. 90% of the work is software engineering, and only 10% is actually about the AI model itself.
